name: eSpectacularKids
overview:
eSpectacularKids is the first online library of shows for children 0-12 y.o., with a catalogue that offers storytelling, theatre, magic, puppet shows, concerts, workshops and much more. We specialize in bringing all types of performing arts to the digital channel. Original high-quality content in English and Spanish to entertain the whole family.

Our primary objective is to entertain children with a real alternative to cartoons, films and commercial video games. eSpectacularKids is a space totally dedicated to children´s development, education and dialogue which opens a window to the world of shows and performing arts. At the same time it is an effective and enjoyable tool to facilitate the learning of new languages.

As well as the audio visual offer, eSpectacularKids provides a blog containing many articles related to childrens development, psychology, relationships, health, education and entertainment.
